title: So, you have literally 2 giant obvious problem champs right now.....so you destroy Karma?
body: There was no reason you had to fuck with karma. I don't understand why you needed to do anything to her. You already completely took away her passive. If you asked 100 people what karmas passive is, none of them would know. You know why? She doesn't matter. She wasn't out of control. But yeah, thanks for that shield damage nerf making her unplayable with 0 teamfight presence. I appreciate it.

replies.body: No shield bomb, not Karma. The "rework" was bad enough, but c'mon.
I'm happy the shieldbomb is gone now. She now reminds me even less of my champion. You know Karma its not really anymore now its Skarma.

I forget she is a champ half the time, and that isn't me making a smart ass comment. I was trying to play "random supports I don't play often" the other day in team builder, and someone mentioned Karma....and I had a O_O moment, cause I legit forgot she was there.

No one plays her mid or support much anymore (not that I think she is bad, because I didn't), but I don't get her suddenly getting attention, especially anything outside of buffs.

It would be like nerfing Varus' ult because no one plays him. Would make me go O_o
This Karma change isn't exactly a nerf, it's a change in a direction people don't like. More supporty stuff for much less damage.
Yes, something tells me she'll be okay.

Karma is one of the most broken champions in the game if you have experience with her. This really doesn't put her into an Alistair level zone. Alistair can pretty much only go support, Karma still has options to her lanes even with this.

people that QQ about these karma changes, especially before having the chance to play them, are just going to be people i assume don't play karma very much or aren't very good with her
the changes seem to really allow her to be less constrained and more effective with multiple chances to use mantra

i might be in the minority here, but I legit didn't even know her R+E did damage. Does it even say that on the ability? 

regardless, I don't play karma much, but I have and have wrecked face with her. Imo kind of broken. a good karma is almost more infuriatingly good at kiting than Kallista. And its not the E damage that made her good..

Apparently someone has never seen a good Karma. And these aren't nerfs by any means. Well it's a combonation of buffs and nerfs, but only mention the nerfs because it makes you look correct... human logic OP.
